#summary Apply real-time LADSPA plugins with ALSA

= Introduction =

Apply real-time LADSPA plugins to your soundcard output using ALSA.

= Install =

  * Install [http://www.thedigitalmachine.net/alsaequal.html alsaequal]. 
  * Edit your $HOME/.asoundrc to look like this:

Example for introducing delays up to 60 seconds (you'll need [http://www.ladspa.org/cmt/ cmt plugins]):

{{{
ctl.equal {
  type equal;
  library "/usr/lib/ladspa/cmt.so";
  module "delay_60s";
}

pcm.plugequal {
  type equal;
  slave.pcm "dsp0";
  library "/usr/lib/ladspa/cmt.so";
  module "delay_60s";
}

pcm.equal {
   type plug;
   slave.pcm plugequal;
}

pcm.dsp0 {
    type plug
    slave.pcm "dmix"
    hint {
         show on
         description "My dmix dsp0"
    }
}
}}}

= Usage =

Instruct your multimedia application to use _equal_ device, for example:

{{{
$ mplayer -ao alsa:device=equal video.avi 
}}}

And now modify setting real-time with alsamixer:

{{{
$ alsamixer -D equal
}}}
